record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, my understanding is that we are in morning business, and the minority side is actually allocated certain amounts of time. They are not here.

I ask unanimous consent that I may speak in morning business, with the understanding that if someone on the minority side comes to speak in morning business on their time, I will relinquish the floor.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
